mapper.select: SELECT restaurantid, restaurantname, city, address, phone, rating, yelpurl, imgurl, updated FROM fvb_restaurant WHERE restaurantname = #{restaurantName} AND city = #{city} AND address = #{address}
mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO fvb_restaurant (restaurantname, city, address, phone, price, rating, yelpurl, imgurl, updated) VALUES (#{restaurantName}, #{city}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{price}, #{rating}, #{yelpUrl}, #{imgUrl}, now());
